text: @realDonaldTrump Of Course America Will Be Great Again. But President, Why You Still Not Compel China To Allow The Team Of International Experts To Investigate The Incident Of COVID-19 At UHAN Laboratory In China ? Please Take Appropriate Action Immediately.
